註釋:
括號內數字是與上年比較的變動百分率。
Title1: Figures in brackets are percentage changes over the preceding year.

cTitle1: (a) 在2019 冠狀病毒病疫情影響下，未能提供2020至2022年的數字。
Title1: (a) Owing to the COVID-19 pandemic, figures from 2020 to 2022 are not available.

cTitle1: (b) 不過夜旅客的定義由2023年起作出修訂。因此，由 2023 年起的統計數據未必能與過往的數據作出比較。
Title1: (b) The definition of same-day visitor has been revised since 2023.  Hence, the figures from 2023 onwards may not be comparable with those for the previous years.
